working.title: Angel in a Cave
working.description: Of deep personal significance to me, it represents a real turning point in my life, a moment that can only be descibed as light rushing into a dark cave and the wings of an angel, love, light and an ocean. What more does a guy need.

next.title: tulip
next.description: Stiill in transit through time and space, my mind and its future place.

reading.title: Light
reading.subtitle: A Radiant History from Creation to the Quantum Age
reading.description: As an artist and amateur scientist, or so I tell myself. I am fascinated with light, I found this book in the library, I know nothing of the author except he's writen one of the most beautiful introductions I have ever read and I can't wait to hear the rest.
reading.author: Bruce Watson
